means: 富有洞察力的，有深刻见解的

sentence.Network_en: She offered some really interesting, insightful observations.
sentence.Network_cn: 她给出了一些非常有趣又富有洞察力的评论。

sentence.Network_en: The statute is hardly a masterpiece of insightful policymaking or incisive drafting.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个法案几乎不算一个有见识的杰作,也算不上是个透彻的草案.

sentence.Network_en: This is not an insightful article. It's all just filler , really.
sentence.Network_cn: 这不是一篇很有见地的文章. 只是一篇补白, 仅此而已.

list.abs: 环球透视（Global Insight）经济学家纽波特说∶「房市还是相当低迷。市场对新屋的需求极其疲弱，被查封的房屋有增无减。这是欲振 …
近期环球透视机构(Global Insight)及国际货币基金(IMF)公布的世界经济展望报告，皆看淡全球经济前景。主要国际经济动向简述如次：
戴伊：我们不谈数据问题，而是先来谈谈市场洞察力（market insights）问题，也就是理解消费者需求变化并能够提出可操作性想法的 …
缺乏消费者洞察（Consumer Insight）：政策是产品，国民都是消费者，期待消费者买单产品，最起码要先理解消费者来这网站的目地 …
七月十九日橘色山柳兰（Orange Hawkweed） 独具慧眼（Keep insight）七月二十日青兰（Obedient Plant） 顺从（Obedience） 七 …

entry.tran: 富有洞察力的;有深刻见解的
entry.def: If you describe a person or their remarks as insightful, you mean that they show a very good understanding of people and situations.

example.ex: She offered some really interesting, insightful observations.
example.tran: 她给出了一些非常有趣又富有洞察力的评论。

means.word_mean: 1. exhibiting insight or clear and deep perception;

sentences.sentence: "the chapter is insightful and suggestive of new perspectives"-R.C.Angell

auth_sentence.content: These insightful tales make Imagine well worth the read.
auth_sentence.res_content: These insightful tales make Imagine well worth the read.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These insightful tales make Imagine well worth the read.

auth_sentence.content: How insightful is of course a matter of perspective.
auth_sentence.res_content: How insightful is of course a matter of perspective.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How insightful is of course a matter of perspective.

auth_sentence.content: He is a broad-minded pragmatist and an insightful strategist.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is a broad-minded pragmatist and an insightful strategist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is a broad-minded pragmatist and an insightful strategist.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 富有洞察力的,有深刻见解的
stems_affixes.word_buile: insight[n.洞察力,见识]+ful有……的→adj.富有洞察力的,有深刻见解的
in进入+sight眼光；观察，看→眼光看进去→洞察力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 勘漏, 失察, 疏忽, 失败, 小心照顾
stems_affixes.word_buile: over在……之上,越过+sight眼光；观察，看→越过[漏洞]→没看到
sight眼光；观察，看→n.视力,视觉,见,视域,眼界
sight视力,视觉+see眼光；观察，看+ing状态→n.观光，游览
